title: Can I use a DigiLocker verified marksheet for the CA foundation registration? - Quora
tags: The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI)

response.answer_text: It is now internationally accepted, I came across a case where this marksheet is being accepted by UK university. So I guess you can use this and even if you are not having your marksheet right now you can still register for it, and provide the copy of your marksheet later on before appearing in this Nov attempt.
yes u can use it, it is valid for the exam.
